#include <cstdio>




int main() {
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
    #endif
    int l, m, n, i, j;
    scanf("%d", &l);
    int a[l][l];
    n = l * l;
    if (l & 1) {
        for (m = 0; m < l/2; m += 1) {
            for (i = l-m-1; i > m; i -= 1) a[l-m-1][i] = n--;
            for (i = l-m-1; i > m; i -= 1) a[i][m] = n--;
            for (i = m; i < l-m-1; i += 1) a[m][i] = n--;
            for (i = m; i < l-m-1; i += 1) a[i][l-m-1] = n--;
        }
        a[l/2][l/2] = 1;
    } else  {
        for (m = 0; m < l/2; m += 1) {
            for (i = m; i < l-m-1; i += 1) a[m][i] = n--;
            for (i = m; i < l-m-1; i += 1) a[i][l-m-1] = n--;
            for (i = l-m-1; i > m; i -= 1) a[l-m-1][i] = n--;
            for (i = l-m-1; i > m; i -= 1) a[i][m] = n--;
        }
    }
    for (i = 0; i < l; i += 1) {
        for (j = 0; j < l; j += 1) {
            printf("%4d", a[i][j]);
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
